    • Uses of FuncSpec in org.apache.pig.piggybank.storage.allloader

      Methods in org.apache.pig.piggybank.storage.allloader that return FuncSpec 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FuncSpec LoadFuncHelper.determineFunction(String location)
      If location is a directory the first file found in the directory is used.
      The file extension of the file will be searched against the file.extension.loaders mappings.
      FuncSpec LoadFuncHelper.determineFunction(String location, org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path path)
      The file extension of the file will be searched against the file.extension.loaders mappings.
